prodNameC: "西門子" 四碘甲狀腺素試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
(1) ADVIA Centaur T4: lite reagent, solid phase
(2) ACS: 180 T4: lite reagent, solid phase, T3/T4 releasing agent
lite reagent: monoclonal mouse anti-T3 antibody (~1 ug/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in sodium barbital buffer with protein stabilizers, ANS, EDTA, and sodium azide (0.1%)
solid phate: T4(~0.2 ug/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in sodium barbital buffer with protein stabilizers, ANS, EDTA, and sodium azide (0.1%)
T3/T4 releasing agent: 0.4 N sodium hydroxide
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 配合"拜耳"全自動冷光免疫分析儀使用，定量血清中的四碘甲狀腺素。
mdFormat: (1) ADVIA Centaur T4 (500 tests, 100 tests)(2) ACS: 180 T4 (300 tests, 50 tests) 註銷規格： ACS: 180 T4 (300 tests, 50 tests)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1700 總甲狀腺素試驗系統
